basic.description: For those with no histology background, an outline of basic vertebrate tissues. Extra assignments will be given to graduate students. Fall term. Lectures and laboratories in common with ANAT-309 in Fall Term. F.W.K. Kan EXCLUSION: ANAT-311, ANAT-309 , ANAT-831*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Cell Structure and Basic Tissues
